technical_skills: Python (OOP, NumPy, Pandas, Scikit-learn, PyTorch/Keras, pytest, FastAPI)
experience_requirements: 2-5+ years in data science / ML engineering with focus on time-series
Experience leading or coordinating teams or projects
Production ML pipelines and deployment experience
Industry/domain experience in engineering/industrial or remote sensing is a plus
key_responsibilities: Develop ML models for forecasting, with emphasis on temporal series and stock price prediction
Apply Python-based time-series methods and Prophet for forecasting
Lead end-to-end data-driven solutions from data collection to model deployment
Collaborate with cross-functional teams (engineering, PM, operations) to translate requirements into ML solutions
Communicate model results to non-technical stakeholders and document methodologies
education_requirements: Bachelor's degree in Telecommunications Engineering / Computer Science / Mathematics or related field
Data Science diploma (National University of Córdoba, 2024)
nice_to_have: Cloud ML ops (Docker, Kubernetes, AWS/GCP) and orchestration
Experience with Prophet in a production setting
reporting_structure: Reports to Head of Data Science
key_projects: SABIA-Mar satellite mission L0 processing improvements
Launch of AI division and expansion into CV / Industry 4.0
Datathon Río Cuarto 2024 - LLM chatbot for bullying prevention (ETL/ML)
career_growth: Path to Lead Data Scientist or Principal ML Engineer
Opportunity to specialize in finance/time-series forecasting and Prophet
training_provided: Internal training on satellite data processing and CV
diversity_inclusion: Committed to diversity and inclusive hiring
special_instructions: Emphasize experience with time-series forecasting and Prophet.
Provide evidence of production ML pipelines and stock-price forecasting if available.

strengths: Hands-on with CV/AI for industry 4.0 and satellite data
gaps: No explicit finance/stock market forecasting track record

score_explanation: Technical skills score reflects strong Python, ML, and time-series capabilities, but Prophet-specific experience is lacking.
Soft skills score is high due to demonstrated leadership, stakeholder communication, and cross-functional collaboration.
Experience score is solid with 5+ years in related roles and production ML work, though domain relevance to finance is moderate.
Education score is high due to data science diploma and Stanford ML specialization in addition to a technical engineering background.
Industry score is moderate because most experience is in aerospace/industrial domains, not finance.
